name: Malware Bites
description:
NOTE: Due to the complexity of some parts of this game, we have been unable to get a functioning web build working. Sorry about that!

Games For Plants presents:

Malware Bites!

The robots are invading! Reality is falling apart! There is no chance of escape! Shoot a big gun!

Hot off the presses from Games for Plants comes Malware Bites, a rogue-like first-person shooter made in a single week for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2! Blast your way through the never-ending metal horde, but be careful: reality itself seems to be fighting against you...

Features:

- ONE hand-crafted gun, inspired by Devil Daggers!

- RANDOM modifiers that constantly force you to change your play-style, numbering in the double-digits! (There's 10.)

- AN EPIC STORY told in pieces, written by a college dropout! And you can really tell!

- A SCALING DIFFICULTY that adds MORE ENEMY VARIETIES as you PROGRESS THROUGH THE GAME!

- Retro pixel art made by REAL HUMAN BEINGS!

- A constantly-shifting soundscape, mixed and produced by someone who's BETTER AT THIS THAN US!

- FAR LESS humor than is in this description! Is that chaotic enough?

Here at Games for Plants, we understand that your time is worth it's weight in gold, so we made a game worth it's weight in bronze. So what are you waiting for? Download Malware Bites directly into your frontal lobe and die of an unrelated aneurysm today!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look Around

Spacebar - Jump

Left click - Shoot

1 - Machine Gun Mode

2 - Shotgun Mode (a little buggy)

M - Toggle Mouse Smoothing

Tips:

* Jumping can be more useful than you think, whether that be to dodge shots, or make the hit detection slightly better up-close! Hammer that space-bar like Bill Gates hammers orphans!

* Stuck in front of a raging GPU firing Non-Brand Specific Cryptocurrency at you? In a pinch, you can shoot enemy projectiles out of the air!

* Having trouble passing waves? Try standing on the wires! We took into account cowards like you!

* Bullets home slightly towards where you're looking! I don't know what bug caused that, but use it to your advantage if you can!

Please rate the game after downloading and playing it as we have quite a few more downloads than ratings and we would love all the feedback possible! Thank you! - Aleks, Games For Plants
